title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.23 - Maximum number of games to be played
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.23 - Maximum number of games to be played

State Regulations

No licensee shall conduct more than 35 bingo games on a
single occasion. In the case of limited period bingo, no licensee shall conduct
more than 60 games on a single occasion, and at least 20 minutes shall elapse
between occasions conducted on the same day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
